body_html:
@byronyi Thanks for the reply. I am training Tensorflow Object Detection models with new dataset on distributed training. The dataset is < 1GB, I am using hadoop for sharing the files between the workers and parameter servers. Do I still need a network > 10Gbps to train?. Sorry, if I was redundant

Currently:
I am having 1.2 to 3 secs/step implementing distributed training and on single machine training, I have ~0.3secs/step.
